plot: The dishonourable Dokter Schnitzel uses the energy of young people to make his deceased mother live again.
title: La malédiction de Doktor Schnitzel
plot_es: The dishonourable Dokter Schnitzel uses the energy of young people to make his deceased mother live again.
plot_en: The dishonourable Dokter Schnitzel uses the energy of young people to make his deceased mother live again.
